summary: Electrical Girl centers around a horny young woman (Sophie Ngan) who has electrical genitals. When young Jan gets sexually aroused, she emits bolts of electricity from various orifices.
cast: Sophie Chin Man Ngan|Shu-Kei Wong|King-Tan Yuen|Suet Lam|Teresa Mak|Yee-Tung Cheung|Grace Lam|Siu-Kei Lee|Shiu Hung Hui|Charlie Cho|Sammuel Leung|Ka Yu Chow
title: Fat din chiu giu wa
